title: APPRVD! SBT GRVL Secures Green Light for 2025
content:
More than a year of divisive community debate over SBT GRVL is resolved after Routt County Commissioners conditionally approved new two-day format for June 2025.

Read the full article at APPRVD! SBT GRVL Secures Green Light for 2025 on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
